sentences.english: To establish a coherent and comprehensive population policy.

sentences.english: It took everything into consideration, balancing shadow with light.

sentences.english: Having been recognized by lodgers for excellent hospitality services or good service practices.

sentences.english: Also consider even detail point to help somebody attain his aim, the chair foot with simple modelling resembles thalamus .

sentences.english: They were incredibly conscientious about me.

sentences.english: See your dentist every 6 months for a cleaning and check up.

sentences.english: From top to bottom, this unmatched estate unlocks a new life of luxury.

sentences.english: The doctor gave the patient a thorough check-up.

sentences.english: However, some issues should be taken into consideration.
sentences.chinese: 但還是有一些問題是需要考慮周全的。

sentences.english: To begin with, we must consider the problem all sidedly.
